channel.title: Saichethan M. Reddy
channel.description: Recent content on Saichethan M. Reddy

item.description:
About me

I am a junior year undergraduate student at Indian Institute of Information Technology, Bhagalpur in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering with Computer Science as my major. My research interests lie in developing and learning novel deep learning approaches to solve problems (particularly which are relatable to real world). Currently I am Technical Club Secretary of our college, I am also leading Mozilla campus club for more than a year.I love to find answers to all the questions I have and that makes me Happy!

I am also interested in Multimodal Learning, because unlike formal languages natural languages don’t have fixed set of rules(sarcasm,emotion etc..,) in The 7% rule: fact, fiction, or misunderstanding author concluded 93% of understanding depends on non verbal cues, though 93% is debatable but from our real life experiece we also know non verbal cues gives us considerable amount of understanding, multimodal learning can leverage these non verbal cues for better understanding.

My name is little long and often mispronunced that is quite understandable given the spelling is Saichethan. So to avoid any confusion and for others convenience I go with Reddy(formally) and Bunny(informally).

item.title: Work
item.description:
Internships

  1. Summer Internship 2019 IIT Patna: (AI-ML-NLP Lab)
    • Worked on developing Multi Modal Named Entity Recognization (NER), which uses both Visual features and texual (word level & character level) embeddings for better NER accuracy.

item.title: Teaching
item.description:
2018-2019 academic year:

  • WEB 101: Introduction to Web development (Spring)
    • Syllabus, for more content and slides check out Classroom

item.title: Honors & Awards
item.description:
• Paper has accepted for ICCSE 2019 (but not attended)
  • PyTorch Scholar 2019
  • Technical Club Secretary (2018-19)
  • Google India Challenge Scholarship 2018
  • Mozilla Campus Club Lead (2017-18)

item.title: Extra Curicular
item.description:
I love watching animes, Naruto ShippÅ«den and One Piece are my favourites. The Dark Knight(Batman) is one of the finest movies I have ever seen. I play volleyball and table tennis. I follow CNBC regularly for technical updates. I am bit of dreamer and introvert, I prefer to have limited friends.

  • I started a breast cancer awareness campaign PinkRoses, is a place where people can learn about breast cancer, prevention and diagnosis. My goal is to make it an economically sustainable model where any one can get diagnosis for free or nominal price(though it’s long way down that road).
